title: 30 Minutes of Queque's thanks to this crash, very nice
body: Game keeps me disconnecting after 30 secs and now I got 5 matches with 30 minutes of queque's. No words.

replies.body:
1 this is the italian forum, sooo, try be more careful :P
2 be sure to check these things :
- pc : malware, update, settings, programs in background
- check if there are internet problems that could affect the client
3 it's your fault until riot release a patch to fix some client issue

https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/925/493/19f.jpg

Ma non sai neanche il veneto e parli inglese, impara prima il napoletano che Ã¨ chiu importante

Non so che app usare per il voip su telegram, fanno tutte cagare
Going AFK 1 time does not give you a 30 mins queue for 5 games. It means you already went AFK a lot of time.
